name: Kunal
title: Full Stack Developer
tagline: Full-Stack Developer skilled in React, Next.js 14, Node.js, and TypeScript â€” building scalable web applications with AI-driven solutions
about: Full-Stack Developer skilled in React, Next.js 14, Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, MongoDB, and TypeScript. Built and deployed 3 production applications with 30+ APIs, 89+ unit tests, and scalable architectures. Experienced in component libraries, authentication systems, real-time dashboards, and database optimization.

highlights: Developed 15+ responsive React components using Tailwind CSS 4 and Shadcn UI, improving UI consistency by 90%
Optimized JavaScript DOM interactions reducing render times by 40% through memoization and virtualization
Collaborated with 5-member team to deliver 8 client features under tight deadlines
Built backend modules using Core Java OOP principles and optimized data structures for 2x query performance
Designed and implemented array/tree-based algorithms solving 20+ production-level system challenges
Maintained 100% code quality standards through comprehensive testing and peer code reviews

projects.name: StockPulse - Real-Time Stock Dashboard
projects.description: Full-stack stock tracking application using Next.js 14 and Finnhub API integration with Inngest background job processing. Built 15+ responsive components with Tailwind CSS 4, Shadcn UI, and TradingView widgets for real-time market visualization. Implemented MongoDB watchlists, Nodemailer price alerts, and Better Auth authentication.

projects.name: InsightOps - Knowledge Management Platform
projects.description: Architected 31 RESTful APIs and 25 custom React hooks with comprehensive test coverage (89+ unit tests). Developed real-time risk dashboards using Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS 4 with Axios JWT refresh interceptors. Optimized database queries reducing load times by 60% using MongoDB aggregation pipelines.

projects.name: Classroom - Institutional Management System
projects.description: Created 30+ component React library with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, and role-based access control (RBAC). Integrated Drizzle ORM with NeonDB for scalable database operations and automated enrollment workflows. Implemented Arcjet security, Better Auth sessions, and production deployment on Vercel/Railway.

projects.name: Portfolio with AI Chat
projects.description: Personal portfolio website featuring an AI-powered chat assistant that answers questions about my resume using OpenRouter API and structured prompt engineering. Built with React, TypeScript, and Python FastAPI backend.
